name: Hygenercoin
description: HYGENER COIN is an energy block chain coin issued by HYGENER Co., Ltd. of Korea which possesses the original technology of tertiary battery. HYGENER COIN is by developing the mainnet for building a unique block chain ecosystem, well-known, will take its place as a luxury coin. With commercialization of tertiary battery from HYGENER Co., Ltd. domestic as well with the beginning of the industrial revolution in the battery field that will spread around the world, HYGENER COIN is very meaningful to secure its position and value as a real coin, as it is expected to make a significant contribution to the national energy industry. HYGENER COIN is a practical use coin of battery product commercialization, as part of the dividend payment for HYGENER COIN holders due to carbon trading rights in the battery business, expected that the value of mutual growth will be added together with the energy industry of the Industrial Revolution.
